roleset.name: benign, not causing alarm

example.name: non-threatening-j
example.text: Fault - creep movement generally is non-threatening , resulting only in gradual offset of roads , fences , sidewalks , pipelines , and other structures that cross the fault .
example.arg: resulting only in gradual offset of roads , fences , sidewalks , pipelines , and other structures that cross the fault

roleset.note: NONTHREATENING-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.
